MongoUtils

Description

This module exposes methods for creating a mongo connection pool, and for running actions against the db.

Synopsis

  • getPipe :: Configuration -> IO Pipe
  • getPool :: Configuration -> IO (Pool Pipe)

  • fromDoc :: FromBSON a => Document -> Maybe a
